Enumeration Type Documentation

enum pFluidEmitterFlag

Flags which control the behavior of fluid emitters.

See also:
pFluidEmitter
Enumerator:
PFEF_Visualization 

Flags whether the emitter should be visualized for debugging or not.

PFEF_ForceOnBody 

This flag specifies whether the emission should cause a force on the shapes body that the emitter is attached to.

PFEF_AddBodyVelocity 

If set, the velocity of the shapes body is added to the emitted particle velocity.

This is the default behavior .

PFEF_Enabled 

Flag to start and stop the emission. On default the emission is enabled.

enum pEmitterShape

Flags to specify the shape of the area of emission.

Exactly one flag should be set at any time.

enum pEmitterType

Flags to specify the emitter's type of operation. Exactly one flag should be set at any time.

See also:
pFluidEmitter
